Articles.Content:
Hello everyone sorry for being gone for so long :3.

ive been doing competitive gaming and work and stuff ive been compleatly ignoring this game ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

i must have missed alot since ive been gone. ill be more active in the forums soon.

cya later ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

It's always good to see people return. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Welcome back to the forums!

Cheers,

~Claw
